SELECT NUM, USERID, NAME, EMAIL, NICKNAME, BDATE, LOGIN_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, T.*
FROM ( SELECT MI.ID, MI.USERID, MI.NAME, MI.EMAIL, MI.NICKNAME, M.BDATE, M.LOGIN_DATE FROM MEMBERINFO MI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = MI.MID ORDER BY M.BDATE ) T ) WHERE NUM >(#{start}-1) AND NUM <(#{end}+1) ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT NUM, USERID, NAME, EMAIL, NICKNAME, BDATE, LOGIN_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, T.*
FROM ( SELECT MI.ID, MI.USERID, MI.NAME, MI.EMAIL, MI.NICKNAME, M.BDATE, M.LOGIN_DATE FROM MEMBERINFO MI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = MI.MID WHERE ${select} LIKE '%'||#{inputValue}||'%' ORDER BY M.BDATE ) T ) WHERE NUM >(#{start}-1) AND NUM <(#{end}+1) ORDER BY NUM DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERINFO MI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = MI.MID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERINFO MI LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MID = MI.MID WHERE ${select} LIKE '%'||#{inputValue}||'%'

SELECT NUM, S_CAT, TITLE, LOCAL, BDATE, COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, T.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT C.CID , (SELECT S_CAT FROM CATEGORY_S WHERE CATEGORY_S_ID = C.CATEGORY_S_ID) AS S_CAT , RL.CITY || ' ' || S.LOCAL AS LOCAL , C.TITLE , C.BDATE , (SELECT COUNT FROM CLUBMEM_COUNT_VIEW WHERE CID = C.CID) "COUNT" FROM CLUB C LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB J ON C.CID = J.CID LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST L ON J.JOIN_ID = L.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN REGION_S S ON S.REGION_S_ID = C.REGION_S_ID LEFT JOIN REGION_L RL ON S.REGION_L_ID = RL.REGION_L_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON L.POSITION_ID = P.POSITION_ID WHERE C.BDATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ${sort} ) T ) WHERE NUM >(#{start}-1) AND NUM <(#{end}+1) ORDER BY NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.CID) COUNT FROM CLUB C LEFT JOIN JOIN_CLUB J ON C.CID = J.CID LEFT JOIN CLUBMEMBERLIST L ON J.JOIN_ID = L.JOIN_ID LEFT JOIN REGION_S S ON S.REGION_S_ID = C.REGION_S_ID LEFT JOIN REGION_L RL ON S.REGION_L_ID = RL.REGION_L_ID LEFT JOIN POSITION P ON L.POSITION_ID = P.POSITION_ID WHERE C.BDATE IS NOT NULL
